org.sadiframework.service.ontology

Interface ServiceOntologyHelper

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractServiceOntologyHelper, MyGridServiceOntologyHelper

    public interface ServiceOntologyHelper
    An interface that reads/writes service configuration from/to an RDF model. Implementing classes will read/write data according to a specific ontology.
    Author:
    Luke McCarthy

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ServiceBean copyServiceDescription(org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Resource serviceRoot, ServiceBean serviceBean)
      Populates the specified ServiceBean with a description of the service rooted at the specified resource.
      org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Resource createServiceNode(ServiceDescription service)
      Returns an RDF representation of the specified service description using a new in-memory model.
      org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Resource createServiceNode(ServiceDescription service, org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Model model)
      Returns an RDF representation of the specified service description using the specified model.
      org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Resource getServiceClass()
      Returns the rdf:type of a service instance in this ontology.
      ServiceDescription getServiceDescription(org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Resource serviceRoot)
      Returns a description of the service rooted at the specified resource.

      • getServiceDescription

        ServiceDescription getServiceDescription(org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Resource serviceRoot)
                                  throws ServiceOntologyException
        Returns a description of the service rooted at the specified resource.
        Parameters:
        serviceRoot - an RDF resource representing a SADI service
        Returns:
        the service description
        Throws:
        ServiceOntologyException - if the service RDF doesn't match the expected schema

      • copyServiceDescription

        ServiceBean copyServiceDescription(org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Resource serviceRoot,
                                   ServiceBean serviceBean)
                            throws ServiceOntologyException
        Populates the specified ServiceBean with a description of the service rooted at the specified resource.
        Parameters:
        serviceRoot - an RDF resource representing a SADI service
        serviceBean - the ServiceBean to populate
        Returns:
        the populated ServiceBean
        Throws:
        ServiceOntologyException - if the service RDF doesn't match the expected schema

      • createServiceNode

        org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Resource createServiceNode(ServiceDescription service)
        Returns an RDF representation of the specified service description using a new in-memory model.
        Parameters:
        service - the service description
        Returns:
        an RDF representation of the service description

      • createServiceNode

        org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Resource createServiceNode(ServiceDescription service,
                                                     org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Model model)
        Returns an RDF representation of the specified service description using the specified model.
        Parameters:
        service - the service description
        model - the RDF model to use
        Returns:
        an RDF representation of the service description
        Throws:
        ServiceOntologyException - if the service description is missing any required information
